localString.value: Welcome to the Legendary Farm. What can I do for you?
This is the Legendary Farm. I raise special breeds of animals here.
Aye, I have some unique cow and chicken breeds here. I have developed them as incredibly strong beasts capable of wreaking a significant amount of havok.
I host a Trials where I let the world's adventurers fight them. Are you interested?
Very well. There are two stages to the trials. The first stage takes place on the Legendary Cow Farm. The second stage will take place on the Legendary Chicken Farm.

The Legendary Cow Farm is where I raise my special breed of cattle. These cows are a mixed hybrid. I have engineered them to be powerful beasts who will certainly fare well in a melee combat situation. They have very little magical powers, and rely heavily on their brute strength.
You will need to complete the Cow Trial by killing all of the cattle there. Bring me a trophy that proves you did so, and you may continue on to the Chicken Trial. Are you ready to start?
Excellent! Here is a key that will grant you access to the Cow Farm. You will find the entrance on the East end of this farm. Simply go through the tunnel and you will emerge in the Cow Farm.
Yes. Once you enter the Cow Farm, you will not be able to exit through that same tunnel. You will have to find the exit tunnel, and will meet many of my cattle along the way.
I see that you have not brought me a cow trophy. Why not?
Excellent, I see you have brought me the hide of one of my cattle!
Well done, adventurer. Now you can start the Chicken Trial. Are you ready?
Yes, but you will have to complete the Cow Trial first.
Excellent! Here is a key that will grant you access to the Legendary Chicken Farm. You will find the entrance tunnel on the southern edge of this farm.
Yes. Once again, you will have to find your way to the exit tunnel. This will require you to get past my Super Chickens. Bring me a trophy, and you shall be awarded well for completing both trials.
I see that you have not brought me a chicken trophy. Why not?
Excellent, I see that you carry a Super Chicken Feather!
Yes, some are bred with Black Dragons. This feather came from my toughest chicken, who was bred with a furious Red Dragon.
Yes you did. And for that, I shall reward you with these items.
I'm afraid not, my friend. I can only afford to let each adventurer in here one time and one time only. I hope you enjoyed yourself! Now, if you don't mind, I must get back to my farms.
You have already completed the Legendary Farm Trials. Thank you for playing, and have a nice day.
What is this place?
Special breeds?
So, what do you do with them?
Um, no. I'm somewhat of a chicken myself. I'll be going now.
Yes! Tell me more!
Go on.
Um, no. I'm somewhat of a chicken myself. I'll be going now.
I am ready.
Is there anything else that I need to know?
Um, I'm going to change my mind. I'm chicken. See ya!
Very well. I shall return with a trophy.
I am chicken. I had to run out of there; those cattle are crazy!!
Yes, I have defeated those psychotic cattle of yours.
No, I cannot go on. Can I come back later to do the Chicken Trial at a later time?
Very well....farewell.
Yes, I am ready to begin.
Thank you. Is there anything special I should know about the Chicken Farm?
OK, I changed my mind. I'll be going now.
Very well. I shall return.
I couldn't do it. I shall go now.
Yes, I have! Those chickens were quite tough! Are they bred with Dragons?
It was difficult, but I succeeded.
Will I be allowed to do your Trials again?
